'''1.20.2 Pre-release 1''' (known as '''1.20.2-pre1''' in the launcher) is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.2]], released on September 5, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-2-pre-release-1|Minecraft 1.20.2 Pre-Release 1|September 5, 2023}}</ref> which adds further experimental changes to villagers and village explorer maps.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Game rule]]'''
* Added {{cd|enderPearlsVanishOnDeath}}, controlling whether thrown [[ender pearl]]s vanish when the player that threw them dies, defaults to {{cd|true}}.

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added the following structure tags:
** {{cd|#on_desert_village_maps}}: contains {{cd|village_desert}}.
** {{cd|#on_jungle_explorer_maps}}: contains {{cd|jungle_pyramid}}.
** {{cd|#on_plains_village_maps}}: contains {{cd|village_plains}}.
** {{cd|#on_savanna_village_maps}}: contains {{cd|village_savanna}}.
** {{cd|#on_snowy_village_maps}}: contains {{cd|village_snowy}}.
** {{cd|#on_swamp_explorer_maps}}: contains {{cd|swamp_hut}}.
** {{cd|#on_taiga_village_maps}}: contains {{cd|village_taiga}}.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Explorer map]]'''
* Updated structure icons on explorer maps sold by cartographers.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Recipe book]]'''
* The recipe book search has been updated.
** The search only matches the beginning of any word in the item's name.
*** For example, searching for "tor" still shows torch and redstone torch, but not daylight detector anymore.
** All recipes, including those that have not been unlocked, now show up in search results.

'''[[Trading]]'''
* When villagers unlock new trades, the order of those trades in the UI is now always random instead of sometimes being deterministic.

=== Command format ===
'''[[Function (Java Edition)|Function]]s'''
* Numbers used as macro arguments are now always inserted without suffixes, regardless of numeric type.

'''{{cmd|execute}}'''
* Temporarily removed syntax {{cmd|link=none|execute (if{{!}}unless) function}}.

'''{{cmd|return}}'''
* Temporarily removed syntax {{cmd|link=none|return run}}.

=== General ===
'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The data pack version is now {{cd|18}}.

'''Protocol'''
* Client options are now sent during the configuration network phase when joining a server.

== Experimental ==
=== Changes ===
These changes are accessible by enabling the "[[Villager Trade Rebalance]]" experimental data pack.

==== World generation ====
'''[[Ancient city]]'''
* Increases the chance of generating enchanted books with [[Mending]].

'''[[Desert temple]]'''
* Increases the chance of generating enchanted books with [[Unbreaking]] (level I to III).

'''[[Jungle temple]]'''
* Increases the chance of generating enchanted books with Unbreaking (level I to III).

'''[[Mineshaft]]'''
* Increases the chance of generating enchanted books with [[Efficiency]] (level I to V).

'''[[Pillager outpost]]'''
* Increases the chance of generating enchanted books with [[Quick Charge]] (level I to III).

==== Gameplay ====
'''[[Trading]]'''
* Added seven new maps which cartographers can sell, depending on the biome they come from.
** Jungle and swamp villages do not generate naturally. Thus, players must breed villagers or cure zombie villagers in these biomes to access their trades.
** Village maps points to a village in a specific biome. Jungle explorer map points to a jungle pyramid. Swamp explorer map points to a swamp hut.

* Changed trades of armorers:
** Buying diamond armor now also requires a small amount of diamonds.
** Most master-level armorers buy iron blocks and pay 4 emeralds for them.
** Chainmail armor is exclusively sold by jungle and swamp armorers.
** The savanna armorer sells cursed diamond armor at reduced prices.
** The taiga armorer can swap one piece of diamond armor for another.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.2 Pre-release 1
|;From released versions before 1.20
|70127|Some block state changes aren't communicated to clients.
|72721|Chat messages show after death independent of chat setting.
|103800|Sometimes armor stands won't update their visual rotation.
|119873|The text used for the credits button within the title screen is untranslatable.
|154827|Typo in splash text "Verlet intregration!".
|177172|Dash in villager/trader UI is hardcoded / untranslatable.
|193457|Dropper/Dispenser 'Triggered' block state not updating without player interaction.
|201166|A summoned minecart can stay visually tilted.
|248778|The item count symbol within shulker box tooltips is untranslatable.
|248833|The parentheses used before and after the warning label within the language menu are untranslatable.
|248844|The page indicator symbol within the recipe book GUI is untranslatable.
|248846|The colon used within the death screen to show the player's score is untranslatable.
|249355|The hyphen used within the statistics menu to show a null value is untranslatable.
|252295|The word "whilst" within several death messages isn't spelled in American English.
|252298|Death messages relating to the Thorns enchantment don't contain conjunctions where appropriate.
|252316|The word "burnt" within some death messages isn't spelled in American English.
|253241|The player count indicator symbol within the multiplayer menu is untranslatable.
|253269|The advancement progress indicator symbol within the advancements menu is untranslatable.
|253270|The hyphen used within boss bars for raids is untranslatable.
|253278|The percentage symbol used within the level loading screen to show the loading progress of the world is untranslatable.
|253281|Text within filled map tooltips when advanced tooltips are hidden is untranslatable.
|253283|The percentage and chunk indicator symbols used within the optimize world menu are untranslatable.
|253638|The symbols used within shulker box tooltips to show random loot table contents are untranslatable.
|255263|Players' positions are desynced after stopping movement while moving the camera.
|255418|Vertical redstone dust placed against dropper/dispenser/hopper doesn't visually disappear when the dust above is removed.
|256777|The two characters used within the tab list to show players' health are untranslatable.
|260819|The {{cd|death.attack.message_too_long}} string is missing an article before the word "stripped".
|263133|Inconsistent word usage in Out of Memory screen.
|;From 1.20.1
|264233|Player is shown as Anonymous after dying and respawning.
|264574|symlink does not work for root world folder.
|264809|Redstone comparators cause redstone dust connection issue.
|265151|The "(Unknown)" string that's displayed when being banned from a server for an unknown reason is untranslatable.
|;dev
|264615|It takes several seconds for the absorption effect icon to display after obtaining the effect.
|264656|Regular golden apples don't increase the number of gold hearts if you previously ate an enchanted golden apple and then took damage.
